comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Just my opinion ofc, but you should lower the starting bid - Or just try and sell it for what you want for it...  Then again, I start all my auctions at 0 BTC, just for the fun...   Everyone is different tho!  Edit - IIRC, the shipping on these mags was pretty sub-par, so the quality of the corners and such now matter, at least to me.  GL either way mate!
